posts.post_content:
Beautiful but low grade due to two tiny pinholes. Was a PSA 1 but was freed from slab and is now raw (will include flip).

SOLD

*an SGC 1 just sold in REA for [URL="https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=68449"]$1260[/URL] (plus tax)
